meeting_disabled: The meeting is currently deactivated. Please wait while a manager reactivates it.
meetings_limit_reached: The limit number of meetings has been reached. Please wait while the meetings become available.
max_meeting_participants_reached: The limit number of participants in this meeting has been reached. Please wait while places become available.
max_platform_participants_reached: The limit number of platform participants has been reached. Please wait while places become available.
max_server_participants_reached: The limit for server participants has been reached. Please wait while places become available.
meeting_cannot_join: You can not join this meeting.
no_record: No recordings were made in this room.
no_active_meeting: No room is open for now.
allow_custom_usernames: Allow users to change their username in the room
force_server_help: By default, the meeting will be assigned to one of the servers available when it is opened for the first time.
force_server_help2: Activate this option to choose the server to use yourself.
force_server_help_record: Please wait while all recordings are published (publishing may take a few minutes after recordings are finished) before changing server.
running_on_server: The meeting is assigned to the server: %server%.
meeting_disabled_help: Disabled rooms can no longer be opened.
moderator_help_title: Entrances to the room are managed by the managers.
moderator_help_message: Participants are placed in the waiting room while a manager has not validated their entry.
meeting_recorded: Recording is activated in the meeting.
meeting_recorded_help: Upon entering the room, you may be registered. Please contact a manager for more information.
